meanings.definition: A unit of frequency equal to one quadrillion hertz.
meanings.sent1: A petahertz is a very high frequency measurement.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use petahertz to measure extremely fast vibrations.
meanings.sent3: The cat's purring was so fast, it could almost be measured in petahertz.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room was vibrating at a petahertz level.
meanings.sent5: The petahertz frequency was so rapid that it felt like time was standing still.

meanings.definition: The petahertz is commonly used in the field of optics to measure the frequency of light waves.
meanings.sent1: Opticians rely on petahertz for precise light wave frequency calculations.
meanings.sent2: The petahertz measurement helps in understanding the speed of light waves.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball was spinning so fast, it could have been measured in petahertz.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter resonated at a petahertz frequency, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset was captured in the gentle petahertz of the fading light waves.
